snippet.title: exA-Arcadia『アカとブルー タイプレボリューション』| AKA & BLUE TYPE-R for Arcades | Attract Video
snippet.description:
AKA & BLUE TYPE-R for Arcades on exA-Arcadia
Available Now

Players: 1
Genre: Shooter
Monitor: Vertical (Recommended), Horizontal 
Languages: English, Japanese 

FEATURES

WELCOME TO THE NEW STANDARD
This is the next generation of bullet hell shooters. Experience full HD wide screen graphics and HD stereo sound along with an all new game system designed around using bombs as much as possible!

1 FRAME INPUT LAG RESPONSE – twice as fast as your average shooter from the JAMMA era
Maximum performance! Never miss dodging bullets again!

2 PLAY MODES
ARCADE MODE – Play through the story mode and save the world with either hero
SCORE ATTACK MODE – Practice any stage with more lives and an auto bomb option

2 SOUNDTRACKS
ARCADE– the arranged soundtrack composed by WASi303 and performed by video game music bands – Go Sato Band, FANTOM IRIS and O.T.K.
ORIGINAL – the mobile original soundtrack now in HD stereo

FULLY VOICED 
Fully voiced by renowned anime voice actors, throughout every stage, experience the story in real time as every character talks about the action on screen. Play through both Aka and Blue’s stories to discover the secrets of the bomb!

CAST
AKA – SHUNSUKE TAKEUCHI
BLUE – KANADE KOSHINO
MURASAKI – HIROO SASAKI
KURO – WATARU KOMADA

OPERATE IN LANDSCAPE OR PORTRAIT
Works in either screen orientation (vertical or horizontal).

LEARN MORE ➡️ https://bit.ly/3Saayhx
SUBSCRIBE ➡️ https://www.youtube.com/@exa-arcadia?view_as=subscriber?Sub_Confirmation=1


アミューズメント施設向けexA-Arcadia専用
弾幕シューティングゲーム
『アカとブルー タイプレボリューション』
絶賛稼働中

詳しくはこちら ➡️ https://bit.ly/41SwKQu
チャンネル登録 ➡️ https://www.youtube.com/@exa-arcadia?view_as=subscriber?Sub_Confirmation=1 


About exA-Arcadia:
exA-Arcadia is the worldwide leading manufacturer of arcade joystick video games with over 30 high quality titles available now covering popular genres such as fighters, beat'em ups, action and shooters. 

NEVER SETTLE
DEMAND THE BEST
POWER TO THE EXA

https://www.youtube.com/@exa-arcadia
